import React, { useContext, useState } from 'react' import { UserContext } from '../Context/UserContext'; import { getDatabase, ref, set, child, get } from "firebase/database"; export default function Clients() { const [clients, setClients] = useState({}) const { user, setUser } = useContext(UserContext) const addClient = () => { const db = getDatabase() ref(db, '/clients/') }; return (
